questions.question: What is the first step in implementing a desalination project?
questions.answer: Site preparation and construction

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT typically included in the equipment installation phase?
questions.answer: Operator training programs

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of the commissioning phase?

To prepare the site for construction

questions.question: Why is operator training crucial in desalination project implementation?

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT typically included in operator training programs?
